paramDescriptions.label: Turn Speed (rad/s)
paramDescriptions.description: Maximum yaw rotation speed when turning toward a target.

paramDescriptions.label: Arrive Radius (m)
paramDescriptions.description: Distance at which the agent considers itself arrived and stops.

paramDescriptions.label: Move Speed (m/s)
paramDescriptions.description: Base ground movement speed used by the character controller.

paramDescriptions.label: Sprint Multiplier
paramDescriptions.description: Multiplier applied to move speed when sprinting.

paramDescriptions.label: Use NavMesh
paramDescriptions.description: Enable navmesh pathfinding when a NavMesh component is present.

paramDescriptions.label: Repath Interval (s)
paramDescriptions.description: Time between path recomputation while moving.

paramDescriptions.label: Projectile Archetype
paramDescriptions.description: Archetype name to obtain from pool for shots (default Projectile).

paramDescriptions.label: Projectile Damage
paramDescriptions.description: Damage applied to health on hit.
